sentences.sContent: The influence of light stabilizer depletion in the agricultural film processing on product quantity is analyzed.
sentences.sContent_eng: The influence of light stabilizer depletion in the agricultural film processing on product quantity is analyzed.
sentences.sCn: 分析光稳定剂在农膜生产过程中的消耗对产品质量的影响。

sentences.sContent: Nitrogen oxides releases directly by supersonic aircraft into the stratosphere contribute directly to the depletion of the ozone layer.
sentences.sContent_eng: Nitrogen oxides releases directly by supersonic aircraft into the stratosphere contribute directly to the depletion of the ozone layer.
sentences.sCn: 由超音速飞机直接排放到平流层中的氧化氮会直接导致臭氧的消耗。

sentences.sContent: This decreases the device thickness and depletion voltage and consequently reduces material quality requirements and cost of the detector material.
sentences.sContent_eng: This decreases the device thickness and depletion voltage and consequently reduces material quality requirements and cost of the detector material.
sentences.sCn: 这减少了设备的厚度和电压损耗，从而降低材料的质量要求和探测器的材料成本。

remMethod.val: 来自deplete(v. 耗尽， 倒空)

words.tran: 使减少；弄空；耗尽…的资源（deplete的过去分词）
耗尽，用尽；使衰竭，使空虚
